resources.string: He is a daring Italian plumber, known for his bravery, optimism, and ability to face any challenge on his path.
Enhanced jump – Mario can perform a higher and stronger jump, allowing him to defeat enemies, reach distant platforms, or activate special blocks.
Mario\'s younger brother. Although shy, he shows great courage when facing ghosts and other challenges.
Super jump – Luigi can jump higher than Mario.
The Princess of the Mushroom Kingdom. While often rescued, she proves to be brave and powerful in some adventures.
Float – Peach can hover in the air for a few seconds after jumping.
A loyal inhabitant of the Mushroom Kingdom, known for his speed and loyalty to Princess Peach.
Extreme speed – Toad can run faster than any other character.
Application developed by Roberto Linares Rodríguez.\n Version 1.0.
Welcome to the world of Mario
